title: How to Practice a Game with only Bots?
body:
Hi! ^^ I just want to practice with a team of bots against bots, because then I can more easily see the effects of my build. I can also practice all the inputs. 

 I'm thinking of clicking Play, then Create Custom, and Summoner's Rift. But I don't see the option for adding bots. After I click Confirm, will there be an option for adding bots? I don't want to start a PvP game by accident. I'm pretty darn green. haha

Thanks for your help.

replies.body:
Hey HaevenPsye,

Dıana Main's correct, once you're in the Custom Game Lobby, there's an "Add Bot" button that allows you to add any number of bots and adjust their difficulty. Note that depending on server load, sometime you may get a message that states that you need more players in the game before the Custom Game starts.

https://i.imgur.com/heunyAt.png[]
Are you 65 or over with a good driving record?
I have a good driving record. :D
Thank you, Diana Main and Son Golin for your help. Yes! This would be good practice.
Once you create the custom game, you will be able to add bots to both your team and the enemy team. Put a password on it so nobody joins your custom game.
